content: Life is full of mysterious coincidencesâ€”like our meeting in this very moment, the time we both left home and the paths we chose to take...

What does it really mean to "live well"?
Who gets to define that?
When you think about it, as long as it feels worthwhile to you, that's what matters~ (smile)

No one knows which different choice
Might lead to missing someone special...
So mysterious, yeep~

I can't resist the pull of mysterious events,
Like a moth drawn to flame,
I suppose curiosity is both my defining trait... and my weakness.

A teacher from the Academia once said,
"Knowing many truths doesn't necessarily mean you'll live a better life."
Sounds reasonable, but...
